questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: Humans use me as means of transport
I can drink up to 100 litres of water per day
I can last up to 10 days without eating or drinking in the desert

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I have the largest mouth of land animals and the second of the animal kingdom, after those of whales
Don't be scared of me, I am vegetarian !
The sun is my biggest enemy, so when I'm not in the mud, I secrete my own sunscreen lotion

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I'm a feline living in Africa and in West Asia
I'm the fastest animal in the world, I can run up to 109km/h
My fur is dotted with blacked, round or oval spots

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I can "hear" thanks to my legs, which capture the vibrations of the ground. Thanks to this method, I can warn my congeneres of the danger up to 30km
I'm the biggest land animal of the planet (I can weight up to 7 tons)
I'm easily recognizable with my trunk and can live up to 80 years

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: When born, I don't have any hair on my skin.
I am often black and white but I can be brown too
I live in Asia but you can see me in a Belgian zoo.

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I have a blue/black tongue to protect myself from sun rays.
My saliva has antiseptic properties to protect my tongue from the thorns present on some leaves.
Contrary to what we might think, I only have 7 vertebraes like humans, even if my neck can be 5meters long.

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: In India, I'm a sacred animal. You can't eat me and I give my milk to religious rituals
We often see me with black and whites spots, even if I can be brown, black or white
A famous chocolate brand uses me as their logo

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: As would say a famous proverb, everything is eatable in me
I'm one of the main source of meal in the world
In some religions, it's forbidden to eat me

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I live in the cold
My black skin is covered with translucid coat, and my tongue is blue
Due to the global Warming and specifically to the melting ice, I'm very endangered

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I'm the likest animal in France
I spend 70% of my life sleeping
Despite of what the legend say, I don't have 7 lives
